description: When snow flurries start to fly, here's your do-it-all winter staple. Pull on this soft stretch fleece jogger, and you'll have reliable warmth when you need it most and a refined, casual style afterwards. Made with Polartec® Power Stretch®, this durable weave holds high insulation power, while pulling moisture away from skin and adapting to your every move to keep comfortable and dry in activity from snowshoe runs to skin-track schusses.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Power Stretch Pro Jogger - Mens
